},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ArrowUpIcon,{className:"w-5 h-5"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-sm",children:upvotes})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"line-clamp-2 transition-colors duration-300 ".concat(theme==='light'?'text-primary-600':theme==='dark'?'text-gray-300':'text-purple-600'),children:description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center justify-between text-sm",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center gap-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center gap-1 transition-colors duration-300 ".concat(theme==='light'?'text-primary-500':theme==='dark'?'text-gray-400':'text-purple-500'),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ChatBubbleLeftIcon,{className:"w-4 h-4"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:[comments," comments"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center gap-1 transition-colors duration-300 ".concat(theme==='light'?'text-primary-500':theme==='dark'?'text-gray-400':'text-purple-500'),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ClockIcon,{className:"w-4 h-4"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:timestamp})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex flex-wrap gap-2",children:tags.map(tag=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"px-2 py-1 text-xs rounded-full transition-colors duration-300 ".concat(theme==='light'?'bg-primary-100 text-primary-700':theme==='dark'?'bg-gray-700 text-gray-300':'bg-gradient-to-r from-pink-200 to-purple-200 text-purple-800'),children:tag},tag))})]})]})});};
